content.description:
The following code segment appears in a method. The method is intended to print the product of  3  and the nonnegative difference between the  int  variables  num1  and  num2.
 System.out.println(3 * (num1 - num2));
content.question: Which of the following preconditions, if any, is required so that the method works as intended?

skill.text: 4.B: Describe the initial conditions that must be met for a code segment to work as intended or described.
